Explanation: Since the clause states that the provider has the right to remove content and material without prior notice
Since the clause states that the provider has the right to remove content and material without the possibility to retrieve such content and material
Since the clause states that the provider has the right to remove content and material for any reason, at its full discretion

Since the clause states that the provider has the right to remove content and material in order to comply with applicable law, if he believes  in good faith that there is a case of law violation, including intellectual property infringments

Since the clause states that the provider has the right to remove content and material if he believes that there is a case  violation of terms such as acount tranfer, policies, standard, code of conduct
Since the clause states that the provider has the right to remove content and material that he considers to be offensive, obscene, abusive, harmful, objectable, inaccurate, inappropriate

Since the clause states that the provider has the right to remove content and material in order to comply with  the order or request of a court, law enforcement , other administrative agency or governmental body

Since the clause states that the provider has the right to remove content and material that he considers to be harmful to  or as creating threats for the provider's property, Site or Services, or consumers
Since the clause states that the provider has the right to remove content and material if there is a failure in meeting  any applicable quality or eligibility criteria
Since the clause states that the provider has the right to remove content and material in case of complaints about users' performance, conduct, published content and information
Since the clause states that the provider has the right to remove content and material in case of poor Ratings or Reviews
Since the clause states that the provider has the right to remove content and material in order to prevent fraud and illegal activities
Since the clause states that the provider has the right to remove content and material to protect personal safety
Since the clause states that the provider has the right to remove content and material if they could subject the povider to liability
Since the clause states that the provider has the right to remove content and material if they constitute a violation of third party rights, including trademarks
Since the clause states that the provider has the right to remove content and material upon suspenstion or termination
Since the clause states that the provider has the right to remove content and material in case of users' inactivity
